definitions: a small fish of the Indo-Pacific, with a long flattened snout and a laterally compressed body encased in thin bony shields that meet to form a sharp ridge on the belly.

notes.text: Family Centriscidae: several genera and species, including Aeoliscus strigatus, which swims in a head-down vertical posture

shortDefinitions: small fish of Indo-Pacific, with long flattened snout and laterally compressed body encased in thin bony shields that meet to form sharp ridge on belly

definitions: a small, brightly colored wrasse (fish) with a steeply sloping forehead, living chiefly in sandy coastal waters of the western Atlantic.

notes.text: Genus Hemipteronotus, family Labridae: several species

shortDefinitions: small brightly coloured wrasse with steeply sloping forehead
